page.shortlink: api a5 storage delete item function
page.description: Delete an item from storage, including files stored in Amazon S3 or Azure.
page.prototype: L flag = a5Storage_deleteItem(C connectionString, C itemName [,* pResult ])

argument.name: connectionString
argument.description: Character. Storage connection string with ::storage:: as a prefix.

argument.name: pResult
argument.description: *. an optional dot variable that you can pass in that will be populated with information about the object.

section.note: The flag value returned by this function is .f. if the connection failed, but is .t. if the item was not found in storage.
